==Idle Quotes==
{{Dialogue Start}}
: {{DIcon|Idle}} Vision...
:: {{A|VO Zinat 01.ogg}} "Huh... Is it possible to install a vision on a mechanical frame?"
{{Dialogue End}}

==Thoughts==
{{All Schemes to Know Explanation|name=Zinat}}
:{{A|VO Zinat All Schemes to Know 01.ogg}} '''Zinat:''' (So... what is a Vision actually made of?)

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue Start}}
:'''Zinat:''' This subject is better discussed with colleagues in [[Kshahrewar]].
:{{DIcon}} Abut your subject...
::'''Zinat:''' I can't divulge the specifics, but it's a viability study for outfitting constructs with a [[Vision]].
::'''Zinat:''' I'm a {{Rubi|Spantamad|Elementalism}} researcher specializing in the flow of elemental energy. I don't know enough about empowering constructs, so I'll need help.
::'''Zinat:''' That's how academic research works. It's not something one can just power through alone.
::'''Zinat:''' Few can be like [[Rifaet]], who can do research alone and produce lots of results on top of that. Sometimes, it's necessary to work together.
:{{DIcon}} See you.
::'''Zinat:''' See you.
{{Dialogue End}}
